itunes:title: #124: Why You Gotta Take a Break!
title: #124: Why You Gotta Take a Break!
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Rest is SOOO important. It's really about how we treat ourselves and how we feel about ourselves. We talk about how not resting is a fight or flight response and the importance of being aggressive about protecting your peace. ➡️  RESOURCES...
itunes:summary:
Rest is SOOO important. It's really about how we treat ourselves and how we feel about ourselves.

We talk about how not resting is a fight or flight response and the importance of being aggressive about protecting your peace.

➡️ Grab your 2022 Planner and Best Year Ever Bundle

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Join The Recovery School 2.0 to unlearn symptoms of love addiction and love avoidance
  • Apply to work together in From Avoidant to Available
  • Create balance and love in your life with The Loved Woman Planner


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
Instagram: @BlackGirlsHeal
Facebook: Black Girls Heal
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
